Package eu.cqse.check.abap

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssertCommandsAlwaysWithIdCheck
    Checks whether ASSERT commands have an ID.
    CallRfcRemoteFunction
    Checks for calls of function modules RFC_REMOTE_EXEC and RFC_REMOTE_PIPE.
    CallStatementCheckBase
    Base class for checks related to statements which are introduced by a CALL statement in ABAP, see http://help.sap.com/abapdocu_751/en/abapcall.htm.
    CallSystemFunctionCheck
    Checks for usages of CALL cfunc - see ABAP keyword documentation.
    ControlFlowDependingOnSystemVariableCheck
    Checks for usages of system variables, eg.
    CriticalStatementsCheck
    Check which searches for critical statements.
    CriticalStatementsCheckBase
    Base class of searches for critical statements.
    CrossClientDatabaseAccessCheck
    Checks for usages of CLIENT SPECIFIED addition which can be used in Open SQL statements.
    HardCodedLiteralsCheckBase
    Base class for checks on hard-coded character literals.
    HardCodedPasswordCheck
    Checks for hard-coded user names.
    HardCodedUsernameCheck
    Checks for hard-coded user names.
    MissingAuthorityCheckForCallTransactionCheck
    Checks for usages of CALL TRANSACTION where no authority check is done right before.
    MissingAuthorityCheckInReportCheck
    Checks for missing authority checks in reports (executable programs), introduced with keyword REPORT or PROGRAM.
    MissingCheckOfSySubrcAfterAuthorityCheckCheck
    Check which searches missing check of sy-subrc return code after authority check statemtns, e.g.
    MissingCheckOfSySubrcCheckBase
    Base class for checks which search for missing checks on the value of sy-subrc return code which are expected to follow specific statements.
    NoAutomatedCodeManipulationCheck
    Checks whether code is manipulated automatically.
    NoBreakpointCheck
    Checks whether a breakpoint without breakpoint ID exists.
    NoCallToExternalFormRoutinesCheck
    Checks for calls to external form routines.
    NoComplexLogicInEventBlockCheck
    Checks whether complex logic is contained in an event block.
    NoComplexLogicInMacroCheck
    Checks whether complex logic is contained in a macro.
    NoDataDeclarationInFunctionalCodeBlockCheck
    Checks whether data declarations are placed at the beginning of code blocks as declarations in functional code blocks are forbidden.
    NoDbOperationInMacroCheck
    Checks whether a macro contains database operations.

    Implemented checks: Open SQL database operations Native SQL database operations Database operations via Object Services (the custom check for Object Services does not check all possible usages, but the occurrence of "characteristic" methods).
    NoNonClassBasedExceptionViaRaiseCheck
    Checks whether an exception is thrown via RAISE statement as non-class-based exception.
    NoTaskHandlerFunctionCheck
    Checks whether task handler functions (functions in function groups 'THFB', 'THFB2', 'THFB_ALV', 'THSCHED' and 'THTX') are used.
    NoWriteToStandardTableCheck
    Checks for write access to SAP standard tables.

    Implemented checks: Open SQL: INSERT, MODIFY, UPDATE, DELETE Not checked: Write accesses via Native SQL (as it is forbidden anyway) Use of Persistence Service (no good/ efficient idea for implementation, not used) Write accesses in which table name is stored in variable (e.g.
    NoWriteToSystemFieldCheck
    Checks whether write accesses to system fields (sy-xxx or syst-xxx) exist.
    OpenDatasetWithFilterAdditonCheck
    Checks for usages of OPEN DATASET with FILTER addition - see ABAP keyword documentation.
    OpenSqlStatement
    Representation of an Open SQL statement for more detailed analysis.
    SuspiciousStatementsCheck
    Check which searches for suspicious statements.
    SystemVariablesCheckBase
    Base class for check on system variables.
    UnescapedWhereLikeCheck
    This check is off by default, since it may have false positives.
    UsageOfSystemVariablesCheck
    Checks for usages of system variables, eg.
